text: Leslyn Lewis (born December 2, 1970) is a Canadian lawyer and politician. She has been the member of Parliament (MP) for Haldimandâ€”Norfolk since 2021. She is a member of the Conservative Party. She ran for Conservative Party leader in the 2020 leadership election, coming in third. She was the first minority woman to run for the federal Conservative Party leadership. Lewis is also a candidate in the 2022 leadership election. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Jamaican politicians Category:Naturalized citizens of Canada Category:Canadian lawyers Category:Politicians from Ontario
title: Leslyn Lewis
